section.title: Programming Model Overview
section.para: The RLS provides a Client API for C and Java based clients. The RLS Client C API is provided in the form of a library (e.g., .so file). Any installation of RLS will include the shared library as part of the $GLOBUS_LOCATION/include and $GLOBUS_LOCATION/lib directories. The RLS Client Java API depends on the shared library, which it links to via the Java Native Interface (JNI).
